mutants.code:
def bitwise_assign(x, y):
    """
    Assign the value of x to y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The value to be overwritten.

    Returns:
        int: The value of y after assignment.
    """
    return x & (~y & x)

def bitwise_assign(x, y):
    """
    Assign the value of x to y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The value to be overwritten.

    Returns:
        int: The value of y after assignment.
    """
    return x ^ ~y & x

def bitwise_assign(x, y):
    """
    Assign the value of x to y using only bitwise operators.

    Args:
        x (int): The value to be assigned.
        y (int): The value to be overwritten.

    Returns:
        int: The value of y after assignment.
    """
    return x | (~y | x)
